memberdef.name: NDPluginOverlayMaxSizeXString
memberdef.initializer: "MAX_SIZE_X" /* (asynInt32, r/o) Maximum size of overlay in X dimension */

memberdef.name: NDPluginOverlayMaxSizeYString
memberdef.initializer: "MAX_SIZE_Y" /* (asynInt32, r/o) Maximum size of overlay in Y dimension */

memberdef.name: NDPluginOverlayPositionXString
memberdef.initializer: "OVERLAY_POSITION_X" /* (asynInt32, r/w) X position (upper left) of overlay */

memberdef.name: NDPluginOverlayPositionYString
memberdef.initializer: "OVERLAY_POSITION_Y" /* (asynInt32, r/w) Y position (upper left) of overlay */

memberdef.name: NDPluginOverlayFontString
memberdef.initializer: "OVERLAY_FONT" /* (asynInt32, r/w) Type of Time Stamp to show (if any) */
